Posts.Title: Just took my first Tamoxifen pill

Posts.Content: I take that the day before, during and after chemo the only side effect I notice is that it keeps me up all night Hope that helps good luck Hugs Christine
Posts.Title: Steroids

Posts.Content: I know what a hard and horrible road that is. Best of luck with our surgery I will keep you in my prayers Hugs Christine
Posts.Title: Had my last Chemo (at least for now) yesterday

Posts.Content: Just finish round two of chemo last week and now my eye is doing a little dance. Anyone else experience this? Is this a side effect of chemo? Thanks
